text: Jose Manuel Rodriguez Ibañez (born May 20, 1966 in Madrid) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and a T11/F11/B1 type athlete. He competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He finished first in the triple jump and long jump. He finished second in the 100 meter race. He raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. He finished first in the triple jump and he finished second in the long jump. He competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He finished 6 in the triple jump and 11 in the long jump. == References == Category:Living people Category:1965 births Category:Spanish sprinters Category:Spanish long jumpers Category:High jumpers Category:Spanish triple jumpers Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T11 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1 Category:Sportspeople from Madrid
title: José Manuel Rodríguez Ibañez
